title: Huesera: The Bone Woman
review: I thought this was very good as a drama, more so than as a horror. There were some really unpleasant scenes of anxiety and bullying, and that classic trope of nobody believing the protagonist's account, which always works for me. There was one or two really shocking scares in it, and some grotesque moments that triggered me...
spoilers: I squirm a lot at shots of breaking, crunching bones in horror movies. I can barely stand to see people cracking their joints in reality. On top of that, I struggle to watch bad things happening to a baby. I could barely look, just like her, as she woke up and approached the window.
